text:
Assuming they were all relevant and beneficial to my brand, I'd follow the same content promotion as I do for in-house content.

I wrote a Twitter thread last week detailing all the places I share most of our content: <https://twitter.com/DomKent/status/1360230543753945088?s=20>

attachments.fallback:
<https://twitter.com/DomKent|@DomKent>: Content promotion is hard.

When you’ve hit publish, we marketers must now:

:bird: Promote on personal & company Twitter
:male-technologist: Share on personal & company LinkedIn.
:man-woman-boy-boy: Find LinkedIn & FB groups 
:link: Build links with warm & cold connections
:robot_face: Become a Redditor w/o appearing spammy. (1)
attachments.text:
